languages.text: {n}Наместник едва заметно скрипит зубами и слегка подается назад.{/n} "Полагаю, это было совершенно необходимо, раз вы нашли способ пройти мимо оцепления и подвергли себя и весь Футфол риску заражения".

{n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."
languages.original_text: {n}Наместник едва заметно скрипит зубами и слегка подается назад.{/n} "Полагаю, это было совершенно необходимо, раз вы нашли способ пройти мимо оцепления и подвергли себя и весь Футфол риску заражения".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Liege grates his teeth almost inaudibly, and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

{n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

{n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

languages.text: {n}Der Lehnsherr knirscht kaum hörbar mit den Zähnen und weicht ein wenig zurück.{/n} "Ich nehme an, es war absolut notwendig, habt ihr doch die Absperrung überwunden und damit Euch und ganz Footfall dem Risiko einer Infektion ausgesetzt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Lehnsherr knirscht kaum hörbar mit den Zähnen und weicht ein wenig zurück.{/n} "Ich nehme an, es war absolut notwendig, habt ihr doch die Absperrung überwunden und damit Euch und ganz Footfall dem Risiko einer Infektion ausgesetzt."

languages.text: {n}Le suzerain grince des dents presque inaudiblement et recule d'un pas.{/n} « J'imagine que c'était absolument nécessaire, étant donné que vous avez réussi à franchir le cordon de sécurité et que vous vous êtes {mf|exposé|exposée} à l'infection, en mettant ainsi en danger toute la population de Castel. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le suzerain grince des dents presque inaudiblement et recule d'un pas.{/n} « J'imagine que c'était absolument nécessaire, étant donné que vous avez réussi à franchir le cordon de sécurité et que vous vous êtes {mf|exposé|exposée} à l'infection, en mettant ainsi en danger toute la population de Castel. »

languages.text: {n}总督向后靠了靠，发出了低不可闻的咬牙声。{/n}“你这么做，想必是有绝对必要的理由吧？毕竟你穿过了警戒线，导致你和落脚港所有人都面临着感染的风险。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督向后靠了靠，发出了低不可闻的咬牙声。{/n}“你这么做，想必是有绝对必要的理由吧？毕竟你穿过了警戒线，导致你和落脚港所有人都面临着感染的风险。”

languages.text: {n}El Señor aprieta los dientes de forma casi inaudible y retrocede ligeramente.{/n} «Imagino que sería absolutamente necesario, dado que ha encontrado una forma de atravesar el cordón y exponerse a usted y al resto de Paso a riesgo de infección».
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Señor aprieta los dientes de forma casi inaudible y retrocede ligeramente.{/n} «Imagino que sería absolutamente necesario, dado que ha encontrado una forma de atravesar el cordón y exponerse a usted y al resto de Paso a riesgo de infección».

languages.text: {n}領主はほとんど聞こえない程度に歯を食いしばり、わずかに身を引いた。{/n}「検問をくぐり抜ける方法を見つけて、君自身とフットフォール全体を感染の危険にさらしたのだから、それは絶対に必要なことだったんだろうな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

traits.locale_text: {n}領主はほとんど聞こえない程度に歯を食いしばり、わずかに身を引いた。{/n}「検問をくぐり抜ける方法を見つけて、君自身とフットフォール全体を感染の危険にさらしたのだから、それは絶対に必要なことだったんだろうな」

languages.text: {n}Emîr, dişlerini belli belirsiz gıcırdatıp bir adım geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Zaruriymiş herhâlde zira kordonu geçerek hem kendinizi hem de bütün Binliman'ı salgın riskine maruz bıraktınız."
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege almost inaudibly grates his teeth and draws back a little.{/n} "I imagine it was absolutely necessary, seeing as you found a way past the cordon, thus putting yourself and all of Footfall at risk of infection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emîr, dişlerini belli belirsiz gıcırdatıp bir adım geri çekildi.{/n} "Zaruriymiş herhâlde zira kordonu geçerek hem kendinizi hem de bütün Binliman'ı salgın riskine maruz bıraktınız."
